content:
Let's add some time for TV or streaming shows in the evenings.

**Revised Sample Schedule**

**Mondays and Thursdays**

* 6:45 am - 7:30 am: Morning routine (get ready for the day, meditate, etc.)
* 7:30 am - 8:15 am: Get ready to leave the house (pack any necessary items, grab your breakfast to-go)
* 8:15 am: Leave the house and head to your 9:00 am meeting
* 9:00 am - 10:00 am: Morning meeting
* 10:00 am - 12:00 pm: Work/productivity time
* 12:00 pm - 1:00 pm: Lunch break
* 1:00 pm - 5:00 pm: Afternoon work/productivity time
* 5:00 pm - 6:00 pm: Personal time (relax, take a walk, etc.)
* 6:30 pm - 7:30 pm: Workout
* 7:30 pm - 8:30 pm: Dinner
* 8:30 pm - 10:00 pm: TV/streaming time (relax and unwind)
* 10:00 pm - 10:30 pm: Begin winding down for the night (e.g., take a warm bath, practice gentle stretches)

**Tuesdays, Wednesdays, and Fridays**

* 7:00 am - 8:00 am: Morning routine (exercise, meditate, etc.)
* 8:00 am - 8:15 am: Breakfast (oatmeal with fruit)
* 8:15 am - 12:00 pm: Work/productivity time
* 12:00 pm - 1:00 pm: Lunch break
* 1:00 pm - 5:00 pm: Afternoon work/productivity time
* 5:00 pm - 6:00 pm: Personal time (relax, take a walk, etc.)
* 6:30 pm - 7:30 pm: Workout
* 7:30 pm - 8:30 pm: Dinner
* 8:30 pm - 10:00 pm: TV/streaming time (relax and unwind)
* 10:00 pm - 10:30 pm: Begin winding down for the night (e.g., take a warm bath, practice gentle stretches)

**Sundays**

* 7:00 am - 8:00 am: Morning routine (relax, meditate, etc.)
* 8:00 am - 8:15 am: Breakfast (oatmeal with fruit)
* 8:15 am - 12:00 pm: Personal time (relax, read, etc.)
* 12:00 pm - 1:00 pm: Lunch break
* 1:00 pm - 5:00 pm: Personal time (relax, take a walk, etc.)
* 8:00 pm - 9:00 pm: Relaxing walk
* 9:00 pm - 10:30 pm: TV/streaming time (relax and unwind)
* 10:30 pm - 11:00 pm: Begin winding down for the night (e.g., take a warm bath, practice gentle stretches)

I've added 1.5 hours of TV/streaming time in the evenings, from 8:30 pm to 10:00 pm on weekdays and 9:00 pm to 10:30 pm on Sundays. You can adjust this block of time to fit your preferences and ensure you're getting enough sleep. Remember to prioritize self-care and make time for activities that bring you joy and relaxation!
